Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Any Liverpool Journal Piece
Prudhoe, Northumberland March contest - 1st Wallsend Shipyard,2nd Crookhall. Promoted as part of Prudhoe Flower Show. Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £10, 3rd £5. 5 bands competed.
Sept. 14, 2016, 8:28 a.m. Feb. 22, 2019, 1:26 p.m.
